```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(learnr)
library(sortable)
library(magrittr)
```

## Example
Try this programming problem:

```{r iris}
question_parsons(
  initial = c(
    "iris",
    "mutate(...)",
    "summarize(...)",
    "print()"
  ),
  answer(c(
    "iris",
    "mutate(...)",
    "summarize(...)"
  ),
  correct = TRUE)
)
```
